芥子酢味噌: (からしすみそ) - vinegared miso mixed with mustard
芥川賞: (あくたがわしょう) - Akutagawa Prize; Akutagawa Award
芥菜: (カラシナ) - Indian mustard (Brassica juncea); Chinese mustard; leaf mustard; brown mustard; mustard greens
芥藍: (カイラン) - kai-lan (chi:); gai-lan; Chinese broccoli
芥虫: (ゴミムシ) - ground beetle/carabid (esp. of superfamily Caraboidea, but excluding subfamily Carabinae); Anisodactylus signatus (species of ground beetle)
芬々: (ふんぷん) - (of a smell, esp. a good smell) strong
芬芬: (ふんぷん) - (of a smell, esp. a good smell) strong
芭蕉: (バショウ) - Japanese fiber banana (Musa basjoo)
芭蕉旗魚: (バショウカジキ) - Indo-Pacific sailfish (Istiophorus platypterus)
芭蕉梶木: (バショウカジキ) - Indo-Pacific sailfish (Istiophorus platypterus)
芯: (shin) - core , wick, marrow, staple (para grampeador), (pencil) lead, stuffing, pith; core, heart, centre, center
芯のあるご飯: (しんのあるごはん) - undercooked rice
芯のケース: (しんのケース) - pencil lead case (for a mechanical pencil)
芯ケース: (しんケース) - pencil lead case (for mechanical pencil)
花: (ka/hana) - flower , flower, blossom, bloom, petal; cherry blossom; beauty; blooming (esp. of cherry blossoms)
花々しい: (はなばなしい) - brilliant; magnificent; spectacular
花かご: (はなかご) - (はなかご, はなこ only)  flower basket; (はなかご, けこ only) (usu. けこ) flower basket (or plate) used for flower-scattering rituals
花かるた: (はなかるた) - floral playing cards; Japanese playing cards (12 suits of 4 cards, each suit repr. a month indic. by a flower)
花かんざし: (ハナカンザシ) - (はなかんざし only) artificial hairpin with ornamental flowers; chamomile sunray (Rhodanthe anthemoides)
花がるた: (はながるた) - floral playing cards; Japanese playing cards (12 suits of 4 cards, each suit repr. a month indic. by a flower)
花ぎれ: (はなぎれ) - flower-patterned material used to bind the ends of the spine in books
花ござ: (はなござ) - rush mat with a floral or bulrush pattern
花ざかり: (はなざかり) - flowers in full bloom/time of year in which flowers are in full bloom; the age at which someone (esp. a woman) is at the peak of their beauty; booming or peaking (in popularity)
花しょうぶ: (はなしょうぶ) - Japanese iris; blue flag; Iris ensata
花だより: (はなだより) - news of cherry blossom blooming conditions; tidings of flowers
花に浮かれる: (はなにうかれる) - to be intoxicated with the blossoms
花の精: (はなのせい) - spirit of a flower
花の雨: (はなのあめ) - rain falling on cherry blossoms; rain at the time of the blossoming of cherry trees
花はずかしい: (はなはずかしい) - beauty such as to put a flower to shame
花ひらく: (はなひらく) - to blossom; to flower; to bloom
花びら回転: (はなびらかいてん) - prostitution in which services are provided by several women in rotation (esp. in "pink salons")
花びら餅: (はなびらもち) - sweet burdock and miso-bean paste covered with a thin layer of mochi
花ふぶき: (はなふぶき) - falling cherry blossoms; storm of falling cherry blossoms
花も実もある: (はなもみもある) - to have both the looks and the substance; to be a compassionate and just person; to be interesting and instructive
花も実も有る: (はなもみもある) - to have both the looks and the substance; to be a compassionate and just person; to be interesting and instructive
花も恥じらう: (はなもはじらう) - (girl) who outblooms even a flower; even the flower will blush (before her beauty)
花やか: (はなやか) - showy; brilliant; gorgeous; florid; gay
花やぐ: (はなやぐ) - to become brilliant; to become cheerful
花より団子: (はなよりだんご) - dumplings rather than flowers; people are more interested in the practical over the aesthetic
花を供える: (はなをそなえる) - to offer flowers (e.g. at grave); to leave flowers
花を傷める: (はなをいためる) - to spoil a flower
花を咲かせる: (はなをさかせる) - to make lively/to become animated/to have fun talking about something; to become successful and well known
花を引く: (はなをひく) - to play hana cards
花を持たせる: (はなをもたせる) - to let someone have the credit for (a success); to let someone else carry the flowers
花を欺く美人: (はなをあざむくびじん) - woman as pretty as a flower
花を見る: (はなをみる) - to view (cherry) blossoms; to look at flowers
花を観る: (はなをみる) - to view (cherry) blossoms; to look at flowers
花を贈る: (はなをおくる) - to give flowers as a gift
花カルタ: (はなカルタ) - floral playing cards; Japanese playing cards (12 suits of 4 cards, each suit repr. a month indic. by a flower)
花ガルタ: (はなガルタ) - floral playing cards; Japanese playing cards (12 suits of 4 cards, each suit repr. a month indic. by a flower)
花キン: (はなキン) - (from 花の金曜日) thank God it's Friday; TGIF; going out on Friday night; flowery Friday (when young men et al. stay out late)
花丸: (はなまる) - flower circle (equiv. of gold star awarded to kids for good work at school)
花代: (はなだい) - price of a flower; fee for a geisha's companionship
花供養: (はなくよう) - commemoration of the Buddha's birthday
花便り: (はなだより) - news of cherry blossom blooming conditions; tidings of flowers
花信風: (かしんふう) - spring wind telling the tidings of flowers
花合せ: (はなあわせ) - hana awase/type of hanafuda game; flower-comparing contest (Heian period)
花合わせ: (はなあわせ) - hana awase/type of hanafuda game; flower-comparing contest (Heian period)
花吹雪: (はなふぶき) - falling cherry blossoms; storm of falling cherry blossoms
